          <title>
            <string language="es">Fisiología de las bacterias</string>
            <string language="en">Physiology of bacteria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physiologie des Bakteriums</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physiologie des bactéries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Physiology das bactérias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fisiologia dei batteri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσιολογία των βακτηριδίων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Describe los tipos de nutrición, las necesidades de oxígeno, los tipos de reproducción y los lugares donde habitan las bacterias.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic describing the types of nutrition, oxygen needs, types of reproduction and places where bacteria live.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">bacterias</string>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das die Typen von Nahrung beschreiben, 
Sauerstoffnotwendigkeiten, Typen der Wiedergabe und Plätze, in denen 
Bakterium lebt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet décrivant les types de nutrition, besoins de
l'oxygène, types de reproduction et endroits où les bactéries 
vivent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que descrevem os tipos de nutrition, 
necessidades do oxigênio, tipos de reprodução e lugares onde as 
bactérias vivem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che descrivono i tipi di nutrizioni, 
bisogni dell'ossigeno, tipi di riproduzioni e posti in cui i batteri 
vivono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που περιγράφουν τους τύπους διατροφών, ανάγκες 
οξυγόνου, τύποι αναπαραγωγών και θέσεις όπου τα βακτηρίδια ζουν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
